remarks: An element of the base set of the base set of the category of rings (i.e. the base set of a ring) belongs to the considered weak universe. (Contributed by AV, 15-Feb-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ringcbasbasOLD.r $e |- C = ( RingCatOLD ` U ) $.
ringcbasbasOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
ringcbasbasOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. WUni ) $.
ringcbasbasOLD $p |- ( ( ph /\ R e. B ) -> ( Base ` R ) e. U ) $.
